attributes.action: All high schools in the uk are aloud to wear socks to school
attributes.additional_details: Because during the summer it gets way too warm for kids to focus on their work with tights on so it may make a difference with socks on instead of tights please allow kids to wear them
attributes.background: Allow students to wear socks to school

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/639484
Require schools to have appropriate uniform rules for hot weather
